about_the_game:
This is an erotic simulation game with elements of humor. The protagonist, Kouta Morimura, is tasked with managing an old-fashioned massage parlor and must earn enough money within a set deadline to complete a promotion task for the underworld. At the same time, he must also find time to maintain complex emotional relationships with several women. How the story ends depends entirely on the player's management skills and romantic prowess!
Players need to simulate managing a traditional Thai massage parlor, earning enough money to achieve promotions. In your spare time, you can also establish emotional relationships with customers in the shop and go on dates with them.
Besides acquiring customers, another significant challenge in management is training employees!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not suitable for all ages and is intended for players aged 18 and older. It is also not recommended to access during work: the game includes Some Nudity or Sexual Content ,BDSM(Bondage and Discipline, BD;Dominance and Submission, DS;Sadism and Masochism, SM), Adult Only Sexual Content , General Mature Content , Frequent Nudity or Sexual Content,sexual violence (rape, humiliation),sexual assault/non-consensual sex.

short_description: This is a simulation game with strong erotic elements. You play as an underworld member aiming to earn 10 million yen in 30 days for a promotion. Manage a massage parlor by day, promote it at night, and date other characters. Gameplay includes parlor management and pinball battles.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
